item.title: Michelle Williams Muses on the Real Love Story at the Center of ‘Dying for Sex’
item.description: “Friendship can be as passionate as a romantic relationship,” says the star of the FX series, who’s up for an Emmy for best actress in a limited series for her portrayal of real-life podcaster Molly K
